text: The Patriotic Union (, VU) is one of the two biggest political parties in Liechtenstein, along with the Progressive Citizens' Party, being the more liberal of the two. The party was founded in 1936, making it one of the oldest still existing parties in Liechtenstein. ==References== ==Other websites== * www.vu-online.li/ Category:Politics of Liechtenstein Category:Liberal parties Category:Christian democratic parties Category:Political parties in Europe
title: Patriotic Union (Liechtenstein)
